attributes.action: For parliament to discuss (a) the removal of lowest tariffs (b) why standing charges are OUTSIDE the power bills.
attributes.additional_details:
For parliament to discuss the removal of ALL lower tariffs and why power companies have put standing charges OUTSIDE the bill.
Parliament to instruct power companies to re-instate the Age UK tariff and to include staning charge inside the bill as before thereby REDUCING power bills by average of £14.88p a MONTH>
